derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin, from Greek emporion, from emporos 'merchant', based on a stem meaning 'to journey'

entry.def: ) An emporium is a store or large shop.

means.word_mean: 1. a large retail store organized into departments offering a variety of merchandise; commonly part of a retail chain
